thread.title: Chic a hotel with great vibe...
thread.title_full: Chic a hotel with great vibe... - Review of Hudson Hotel New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: BMW323-coupe
title: Chic a hotel with great vibe...
text: Stayed 7 days....hotel is located at the bottom end of Central Park, Manhattan close to subway stations and plenty of shops around... it's relatively affordable... has some great bars onsite and has a chic vibe.. there are some tips you should know about: 1) standard and superior rooms are tiny, so ask for a deluxe room with a siting area..these are decent sized...2) we wee not advised at check in but they charge $30 per day for use of the gym and internet..I got that reduced at check out but be aware...apart from that it's a good place to stay
